embed.title: Queen Seondeok
embed.description: A burst hero who provides massive damage to friendly units in the battle opening and heals friendly units during the battle.

fields.name: Active Skill: Holy Light Blessing
fields.value:
• Queen Seondeok’s <Holy Light Blessing> skill will recover health of all allied units (troops and heroes). The skill lasts for 6 seconds, during which time Queen Seondeok is immune to all control effects.
• Range: entire field

fields.name: Passive Skill: Radiant Power
fields.value:
• At the start of the battle, Queen Seondeok will allow allied units (troops and heroes) to deal additional damage to enemies equivalent to 5% of the allied units’ max life.
• The additional damage apply to both basic attacks and skill effects.
• Melee allied units who do not have AoE basic attacks will also gain a small AoE effect during this time.
• Duration: 8 seconds

fields.name: Legendary Skill: Holy Strike
fields.value: • When using her active skill, awakened Queen Seondeok will also trigger the <Holy Strike> skill which increase damages to enemy units (troops and heroes).
